attributes.action: Allow voluntary genetic modifications on volunteers that can lead to the next stage of evolution of man.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be psychic? To have the body that you want? Or to just help the rest of the world by furthering the undestanding of the human genonme?
Now you can petition the PM to allow voluntary genetic modifications to your Genome. Longevity, better quality of life, barring for few accidents or mutations, and the joy of being the next stage in evolution await.
